comments:
Build: I20040528 - 1200

1) I was debugging a runtime workbench. 
2) I highlighted an expression in the Java editor, and tried to execute and
display the result (Run -> Display). The expression was "jobManager.currentJob()
!= this". This worked fine.
3) I then highlighted "jobManager.currentJob()", and did Run -> Dispay.

-> The information popup did not appear, and the following NPE appeared in my
